EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName} This a second reminder notice that it is time to renew your Aerowave data plan:
{!Case.Description}
You have received multiple emails notifying you that it is time to renew. As of this email the remaining minutes are: xxx
Please reply with your authorization to update the minutes and we will contact you to obtain your credit card details.If we do not hear from you before XXXX the service could be interrupted due to failure to renew and make payment.
Please include your {!Case.CaseNumber} when sending your reply.
As a reminder, you can use the Aerowave portal site to review your usage, view your purchase history, update your email information and view minutes/calendar thresholds for the assigned tail number.
Regards,
{!Case.OwnerFullName}
